about_the_game:
Bobls is a precise and bouncy 2D retro platformer. Complete the story through the single player or unique two-player campaign, create and play levels made by the community through the level editor used by the developers themselves.

Features:
  • Robust Level Editor used by the developers
  • Level and World sharing for community runs
  • Tight mechanics - jumping, sliding, bubbles
  • Retro pixel graphics
